thread.title: BingoPlus, ArenaPlus and GameZone players can now pay at Bayad outlets
thread.title_full: BingoPlus, ArenaPlus and GameZone players can now pay at Bayad outlets

author: Ma. Isabel Quodala
title: BingoPlus, ArenaPlus and GameZone players can now pay at Bayad outlets
text:
DigiPlus Interactive Corp. (DigiPlus), the company behind BingoPlus, ArenaPlus and GameZone, has partnered with Bayad, a trusted bills payment service provider, to expand over-the-counter (OTC) payment options for its gaming platforms.
The partnership, formalized on October 8, 2025, makes DigiPlus Bayad’s only gaming partner for OTC cash transactions.
Through the collaboration, DigiPlus gamers can now deposit funds at over 800 Bayad Center branches, as well as at partner outlets in malls, supermarkets, and convenience stores across the country. Future updates will add features such as cash withdrawals and mobile access through the Bayad App, making it even easier to play and manage the funds on the go.
“At DigiPlus, our priority is to deliver engaging entertainment while ensuring safe and reliable services for our players,” said chairman Eusebio Tanco. “This partnership with Bayad provides customers with more secure and convenient ways to manage their transactions, reinforcing our commitment to player protection and dependable service at every touchpoint.”
The partnership complements DigiPlus’ existing network, which includes more than 130 physical BingoPlus stores nationwide, a 24/7 in-house customer support team, and a surety bond for player wallets. Together, these expanding touchpoints underscore DigiPlus’ dedication to providing safe, reliable, and accessible digital entertainment for Filipinos.
